/soft/centos7/gcc/11.2.0/bin/c++ -std=c++11  -O3 -DNDEBUG -rdynamic CMakeFiles/NH-HySEA.dir/ShallowWater.cxx.o -o NH-HySEA  -Wl,-rpath,/soft/centos7/openmpi/4.1.1/gcc-11.2.0/lib:/soft/centos7/cuda/11.4.2/lib64 GPU/libGPU.a /soft/centos7/cuda/11.4.2/lib64/libcudart_static.a -lpthread -ldl -lrt /soft/centos7/openmpi/4.1.1/gcc-11.2.0/lib/libmpi.so /soft/centos7/cuda/11.4.2/lib64/libcufft.so -lnetcdf
